name: Abandoned Shop
description: You stumble upon an abandoned merchant's shop. The dusty shelves still hold a few items, and a small chest sits behind the counter. The shop appears to have been left in a hurry.

choices.text: Search the shelves (Find a random item)
choices.resultText: You carefully search through the dusty shelves and find a curious artifact hidden among the clutter. It looks valuable!

The chest is locked with a complex mechanism. You notice a coin slot next to the lock - perhaps the merchant used this as a safe? You insert 25 gold and the chest clicks open, revealing a powerful card inside!

You smash the chest open with brute force, cutting yourself in the process. Inside, you find the merchant's savings - a small fortune of 100 gold! However, you've sustained 15 damage from your efforts.
You decide not to disturb the abandoned shop and continue on your journey.
